articles.title: 'Pod Save America' guest suggests listeners are flocking to Joe Rogan because of 'depressing' mainstream news - Fox News
articles.description: "Pod Save America" hosts analyze why Americans have such little trust in the mainstream media and what is has to do with Joe Rogan's popularity.
articles.content:
"Pod Save America" hosts Jon Favreau and Jon Lovett discussed how Americans are flocking to podcaster Joe Rogan because of a severe distrust in mainstream media outlets.

articles.title: Canadian protesters block access to busiest international crossing in North America in demonstration against COVID-19 measures - 9News
articles.description: Canadian protesters have blocked access to the busiest international crossing in North America in yet another demonstration of their grievances against the nation's COVID-19 rules.
